name: Shadow Antipaladin
description: A small humanoid with a chaotic evil appearance, wearing a breastplate and wielding a scimitar and heavy crossbow. Its sinister features demonstrate its affinity for darkness and necrotic energy.
memorable: It inflicts devastating necrotic damage with its attacks and can manipulate the minds of its enemies.
goals: To spread chaos and instill fear, often manipulating others for its own gain.
relations: Related to other evil creatures, likely encountered with other dark entities or minions.
environment: Often found in dark, shadowy locales or areas devoid of sunlight.
strengths: High agility and resilience, capable of avoiding damage and resistant to magic.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, which imposes disadvantages on its actions.
attacks: Can attack with a scimitar or heavy crossbow, delivering additional necrotic damage on successful hits.
most_powerful_ability: Infectious Insanity allows it to incapacitate multiple enemies, filling their minds with eldritch horrors.
equipment: Carries a scimitar and a heavy crossbow, wearing breastplate armor.
skills: Proficient in stealth, making it a very effective ambusher.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
Gains advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Can avoid damage from certain effects through Evasion.
Uses a reaction to increase its AC against melee attacks.
Necrotic Weapons ability increases its damage output significantly.
test_queries: small evil humanoid with necrotic abilities
agile monster that thrives in darkness
chaotic evil monster with powerful attacks
